member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getControllerAxis(AppOculus::DEVICE,AppOculus::AXIS)
member.summary: Returns the coordinates of the specified controller axis along the X and Y axes.
member.param: Device ID, one of the DEVICE variables.
One of the AXIS variables.
member.returns: X and Y in the range of [-1;1] ([0;1] for a trigger).

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getControllerButtonPressed(AppOculus::BUTTON)
member.summary: Returns the value indicating if the specified button is pressed.
member.param: A button, one of the BUTTON variables.
member.returns: true if the button is pressed; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getControllerButtonTouched(AppOculus::TOUCH)
member.summary: Returns the value indicating if the specified button is touched.
member.param: A button, one of the TOUCH variables.
member.returns: true if the button is touched; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.setControllerVibration(AppOculus::DEVICE,unsignedshort,float)
member.summary: Sets the vibration of the given duration and amplitude.
member.param: Device ID, one of the DEVICE variables.
Duration of the vibration.
Amplitude of the vibration.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getDeviceAngularVelocity(AppOculus::DEVICE)
member.summary: Returns a device angular velocity, in radians per second.
member.param: Device ID, one of the DEVICE variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.isDeviceConnected(AppOculus::DEVICE)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the device connected to the slot.
member.param: Device ID, one of the DEVICE variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getDevicePose(AppOculus::DEVICE)
member.summary: Returns a single pose for a tracked device.
member.param: Device ID, one of the DEVICE variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getDeviceVelocity(AppOculus::DEVICE)
member.summary: Returns a device velocity in tracker space, in meters per second.
member.param: Device ID, one of the DEVICE variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.setEnabled(bool)
member.summary: Toggles the VR mode.
member.param: true to enable the VR mode; false to disable it.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.isEnabled const
member.summary: Returns the value indicating if the VR mode is enabled or not.
member.returns: true if the VR mode is enabled; false if it is disabled.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.setHeadPositionLock(bool)
member.summary: Locks the head position.
member.param: true to lock the head position.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.isHeadPositionLocked const
member.summary: Returns the value indicating if the head position is locked.
member.returns: true if the head position is locked; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.setHeadRotationLock(bool)
member.summary: Locks the head rotation.
member.param: true to lock the head rotation.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.isHeadRotationLocked const
member.summary: Returns the value indicating if the head rotation is locked.
member.returns: true if the head rotation is locked; otherwise - false.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.isPoseValid(AppOculus::DEVICE)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the device pose is valid.
member.param: Device ID, one of the DEVICE variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.setPositionScale(float)
member.summary: Sets a new scale for the world. When increasing the scale, the objects get smaller when they are farther away.
member.param: World scale.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getPositionScale const
member.summary: Returns the current world scale. When increasing the scale, the objects get smaller when they are farther away.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getViewportMode const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating the current viewport mode, that determines the type of image to be displayed in the viewport.
member.returns: Current viewport mode. One of the VIEWPORT variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.setViewportMode(AppOculus::VIEWPORT)
member.summary: Sets the viewport mode, that world scales the type of image to be displayed in the viewport.
member.param: Viewport mode. One of the VIEWPORT variables.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getVersion const
member.summary: Returns the libOVRT version of the HMD.
member.returns: The libOVR version (a UTF-8 encoded null-terminated version string).

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getHmdType const
member.summary: Returns the type of the HMD. Returned values correspond to HMD types listed in OCULUS_HMD.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getHmdProductName const
member.summary: Returns the name of the HMD (UTF-8 encoded product identification string).

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getHmdManufacturer const
member.summary: Returns the name of the HMD manufacturer (UTF-8 encoded identification string).

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getHmdVendorID const
member.summary: Returns the HID (USB) vendor identifier of the HMD.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getHmdProductID const
member.summary: Returns the HID (USB) product identifier of the HMD.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getHmdFirmwareMajor const
member.summary: Returns the major version of the HMD firmware.
member.returns: Major version of the device firmware.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getHmdFirmwareMinor const
member.summary: Returns the minor version of the HMD firmware.
member.returns: Minor version of the device firmware.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getHmdTrackerHFov const
member.summary: Returns the horizontal FOV (if present) of the tracking sensor frustum in degrees.
member.returns: Horizontal FOV of the tracking sensor frustum in degrees.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getHmdTrackerVFov const
member.summary: Returns the vertical FOV (if present) of the tracking sensor frustum in degrees.
member.returns: Vertical FOV of the tracking sensor frustum in degrees.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getHmdTrackerZNear const
member.summary: Returns the distance from the tracking sensor to the near Z clipping plane of viewing frustum.. The returned value was already multiplied by the current world scale.
member.returns: Distance from the tracking sensor to the tracking frustum near Z in meters.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getHmdTrackerZFar const
member.summary: Returns the distance from the tracking sensor to the far Z clipping plane of viewing frustum.. The returned value was already multiplied by the current world scale.
member.returns: Distance from the tracking sensor to the tracking frustum far Z in meters.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getDefaultHmdCaps const
member.summary: Returns HMD capability bits that are default for the current device.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getDefaultTrackingCaps const
member.summary: Returns tracking capability bits that are default for the current system.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getAvailableHmdCaps const
member.summary: Returns HMD capability bits that the device currently supports.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getAvailableTrackingCaps const
member.summary: Returns tracking capability bits that the system currently supports.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getHmdDefaultFov(int) const
member.summary: Returns the default optical field of view for the specified eye.
member.param: Eye: 0 for the left eye, 1 for the right eye.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getHmdMaxFov(int) const
member.summary: Returns the maximum optical field of view that can be practically rendered for the specified eye.
member.param: Eye: 0 for the left eye, 1 for the right eye.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getHmdWidth const
member.summary: Returns the horizontal resolution of the full HMD screen (both eyes) in pixels.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getHmdHeight const
member.summary: Returns the vertical resolution of the full HMD screen (both eyes) in pixels.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getHmdSerialNumber const
member.summary: Returns the serial number of the HMD.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.resetTracking
member.summary: Re-centers the sensor position and orientation: the (x,y,z) positional components and the yaw component of orientation. The roll and pitch components are always determined by gravity and cannot be redefined. See also ovr_RecenterTrackingOrigin method in the OVR_CAPI.h file reference.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getEyeFov(int) const
member.summary: Returns the current field of view of the given eye.
member.param: Eye: 0 for the left eye, 1 for the right eye.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getEyePosition(int) const
member.summary: Returns the current position of the given eye. The returned value was already multiplied by the current world scale.
member.param: Eye: 0 for the left eye, 1 for the right eye.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getEyeRotation(int) const
member.summary: Returns the current orientation of the given eye.
member.param: Eye: 0 for the left eye, 1 for the right eye.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getHeadPosition const
member.summary: Returns the current position of the head. The returned value was already multiplied by the current world scale.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getHeadRotation const
member.summary: Returns the current orientation of the head.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getHeadLinearVelocity const
member.summary: Returns the current linear velocity of the head.
member.returns: Linear velocity of the head in meters per second.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getHeadAngularVelocity const
member.summary: Returns the current angular velocity of the head.
member.returns: Angular velocity of the head in radians per second.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getHeadLinearAcceleration const
member.summary: Returns the current linear acceleration of the head.
member.returns: Linear acceleration of the head in meters per second squared.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getHeadAngularAcceleration const
member.summary: Returns the current angular acceleration of the head.
member.returns: Angular acceleration of the head in radians per second squared.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getHandPosition(int) const
member.summary: Returns the current position of the given hand. The returned value was already multiplied by the current world scale.
member.param: Hand: 0 for the left hand, 1 for the right hand.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getHandRotation(int) const
member.summary: Returns the current orientation of the given hand.
member.param: Hand: 0 for the left hand, 1 for the right hand.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getTrackerPosition const
member.summary: Returns the current position of the sensor relative to the tracking origin. The returned value was already multiplied by the current world scale.
member.returns: Position of the sensor relative to the tracking origin.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getTrackerRotation const
member.summary: Returns the current orientation (sensor roll and pitch) of the sensor relative to the tracking origin.
member.returns: Orientation (roll and pitch) of the sensor relative to the tracking origin.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getLeveledTrackerPosition const
member.summary: Returns the current position of the leveled sensor (aligned with gravity) relative to the tracking origin. The returned value was already multiplied by the current world scale.
member.returns: Position of the leveled sensor relative to the tracking origin.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getLeveledTrackerRotation const
member.summary: Returns the current orientation (only sensor yaw, not roll and pitch) of the leveled sensor (aligned with gravity) relative to the tracking origin.
member.returns: Orientation (yaw) of the sensor relative to the tracking origin.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.getTrackingStatus const
member.summary: Returns the current status of the sensor tracking.

member.name: M:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.isVisible const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the process has VR focus and thus is visible in HMD.
member.returns: true if the information about the HMD session status is visible; otherwise, false.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.OCULUS_HMD_E3_2015

member.summary: The type of the HMD is a Oculus Rift prototype. Used by Oculus internally.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.OCULUS_HMD_ES11
member.summary: The type of the HMD is a Oculus Rift prototype. Used by Oculus internally.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.OCULUS_HMD_CV1
member.summary: The type of the HMD is Oculus Rift CV1 (Consumer Version 1).

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.DEVICE_HMD
member.summary: Oculus head-mounted display.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.DEVICE_CONTROLLER_LEFT
member.summary: Left controller.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.DEVICE_CONTROLLER_RIGHT
member.summary: Right controller.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.AXIS_INDEX_TRIGGER
member.summary: Left and right finger trigger values, in the range 0.0 to 1.0f. A value of 1.0 means that the trigger is fully depressed.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.AXIS_HAND_TRIGGER
member.summary: Left and right hand trigger values, in the range 0.0 to 1.0f. Hand trigger is often used to grab items. A value of 1.0 means that the trigger is fully depressed.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.AXIS_THUMBSTICK
member.summary: Horizontal and vertical thumbstick axis values, in the range -1.0f to 1.0f. The API automatically applies the deadzone, so developers donâ€™t need to handle it explicitly.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.AXIS_INDEX_TRIGGER_NO_DEADZONE
member.summary: Left and right finger trigger values, in the range 0.0 to 1.0f, without a deadzone. A value of 1.0 means that the trigger is fully depressed.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.AXIS_HAND_TRIGGER_NO_DEADZONE
member.summary: Left and right hand trigger values, in the range 0.0 to 1.0f, without a deadzone. Hand trigger is often used to grab items. A value of 1.0 means that the trigger is fully depressed.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.AXIS_THUMBSTICK_NO_DEADZONE
member.summary: Horizontal and vertical thumbstick axis values, in the range -1.0f to 1.0f, without a deadzone.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.TOUCH_A
member.summary: User is touching A button on the right controller.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.TOUCH_B
member.summary: User is touching B button on the right controller.

member.summary: User has a finger on the thumb stick of the right controller.

member.summary: User is touching the index finger trigger on the right controller.

member.summary: User's right index finger is pointing forward past the trigger.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.TOUCH_RTHUMB_UP
member.summary: User's right thumb is up and away from buttons on the controller, a gesture that can be interpreted as right thumbs up.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.TOUCH_X
member.summary: User is touching X button on the left controller.

member.summary: User is touching the index finger trigger on the left controller.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.TOUCH_LINDEX_POINTING
member.summary: User's left index finger is pointing forward past the trigger.

member.name: F:Unigine.Plugins.AppOculus.TOUCH_LTHUMB_UP
member.summary: User's left thumb is up and away from buttons on the controller, a gesture that can be interpreted as left thumbs up.
